p: HAdV pneumonia is the most common manifestation of severe HAdV infection in immunocompetent patients, but accounts for less 5% of all HAdV infection [ 35]. In our analysis, pneumonia patients had higher WBC counts and CRP levels than non-pneumonia patients. This was consistent with a previous study, which showed that leukocytosis was seen in one-fourth of the patients and a moderately elevated CRP > 40 mg/L was seen in nearly two-thirds of the patients [ 35].
